content:
Hey folks, I cut a new release of Devel module (triggered by PHP 7.4 support, thanks @Joseph Flatt ). https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/devel/releases/tag/1.x-1.8.0

backdrop-contrib/devel
Provides helper functions for Backdrop developers. - backdrop-contrib/devel

@klonos I saw you had a _bunch_ of cross ports coming through. Could you put any fixed issues that were merged into the 1.8.0 milestone? We haven't used milestones for Devel before so there wasn't anything to put them in previously.
